children.value: Text scrolling effect, you can scroll numbers and other types of text.
You can set the starting value with
. The RollingText component will automatically start animation and roll from the starting value to the target value.
You can set the scrolling direction of the number through the
attribute. The default is to scroll down. Set it to
Set the stop sequence of each digit
You can set the stopping order of each digit of the animation through the
property. By default, the high position is stopped first, and if set to
, it can be stopped from the ones position first.
You can set the flipping of non-numeric content using the

attribute. The component will flip from the first item to the last item in the array. Please ensure that the array length is greater than or equal to 2, and that the length of each item is consistent.

The RollingText component provides some CSS variables. You can override these variables to customize the style, or you can directly modify the component's style. Additionally, you can set the height of the number via the
After obtaining the component instance through ref, you can call the
method is used to start the animation, and the
method is used to reset the animation.

props.code:
<view class="my-rolling-text">
   <z-rolling-text
     ref="rollingTextRef"
     :start-num="0"
     :target-num="54321"
     :auto-start="false"
     :height="54"
   />
</view>
<z-grid
   clickable
   :column-num="2"
   :custom-style="{ 'margin-top': '20rpx' }"
>
   <z-grid-item icon="play-circle" text="Start" @click="start" />
   <z-grid-item icon="reload" text="Reset" @click="reset" />
</z-grid>

children.value: Content array, used to flip non-numeric content

Through ref, you can get the RollingText instance and call the instance method.
The component provides the following CSS variables, which can be used to customize styles. For usage, please refer to

html .default .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}html.dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}

children.text: Set the stop sequence of each digit
